entities.name: moon charts
entities.description: Harry is discussing moon charts with someone, but no further details are provided.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is a person who has escaped from Azkaban and Harry's parents are worried about him.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison where Sirius Black was being held.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who has returned to Hogwarts and is enjoying his summer break.

entities.name: florean fortescue's ice cream parlor
entities.description: Florean Fortescue's Ice Cream Parlor is a place where Harry goes to finish his homework and get free sundaes.

entities.name: floren fortescue
entities.description: Florean Fortescue is the owner of Florean Fortescue's Ice Cream Parlor who gives Harry free sundaes.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is a bank where Harry goes to withdraw money from his vault.

entities.name: harry's parents
entities.description: Harry's parents are worried about Sirius Black and want him back in Azkaban.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel relatives who he has to ask for money for spellbooks.

entities.name: gobstones
entities.description: Gobstones is a wizarding game that Harry wants to buy but decides not to spend his money on it.

relationships.description: Harry is worried about Sirius Black's escape from Azkaban.
Sirius Black was being held in Azkaban and Harry is concerned about him.
Harry goes to Florean Fortescue's Ice Cream Parlor to finish his homework and get free sundaes.
Harry withdraws money from his vault at Gringotts.
Harry has to ask the Dursleys for money for spellbooks.
Florean Fortescue gives Harry free sundaes.
